videos.description: Duncan Robinson starts out hot from behind the arc, draining a pair of 3-pointers.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Duncan Robinson drains back-to-back 3-pointers to open game) 2022/01/27 ESHEET

videos.description: Bam Adebayo connects with P.J. Tucker who hits the nice reverse layup.
